 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנִּין‎</span> (erroneous <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנִּים‎</span>) **noun masculine**<sup>[[Ezek.29.3|Ezek 29:3]]</sup> ==serpent, dragon, sea-monster== (Late Hebrew ***id.*** (rare); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, loan-word from Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תַּנִּינָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>123</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[Exod.7.9|Exod 7:9]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִ֯ם‎</span> [[Ezek.29.3|Ezek 29:3]]; [[Ezek.32.2|Ezek 32:2]] (by confusion with plural of [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּן‎</span>]); plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנִּינַם‎</span> [[Gen.1.21|Gen 1:21]], etc.; — 

**1.** ***serpent***, [[Deut.32.33|Deut 32:33]] (venomous), [[Ps.91.13|Ps 91:13]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּתֶן‎</span>), [[Exod.7.9|Exod 7:9]]; [[Exod.7.10|Exod 7:10]]; [[Exod.7.12|Exod 7:12]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). 

**2.** ***dragon***, as devourer (simile) [[Jer.51.34|Jer 51:34]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵין הַתּ‎</span> [[Neh.2.13|Neh 2:13]], near Jerusalem 

**3.** ***sea***- (or river-) ***monster***, [[Gen.1.21|Gen 1:21]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); figurative [[Job.7.12|Job 7:12]]; [[Ps.74.13|Ps 74:13]] (i.e. Egyptains), [[Isa.27.1|Isa 27:1]]; [[Isa.51.9|Isa 51:9]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַהַב‎</span>, mythological personification of chaos); in summons to praise <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ps.148.7|Ps 148:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּהֹמוֺת‎</span>). — See [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Ency. Bib. DRAGON</sup> [[BDB#Gunk|Gunk]]<sup>Seh-pfung 69 ff.</sup> Barton<sup>JAOS xv. 1 (1891). 23 f.</sup>; personified of water-spout [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Semitic i. 161; 2nd ed. 176</sup>; compare Greek fish-name <span class="bdbLangGreek">θύννος</span> [[BDB#Lewy|Lewy]]<sup>Fremdw. 15</sup>.
